package.name: h1_fullbody_controller
package.description: This package implements a fullbody controller for the H1 humanoid robot using a neural network policy. The policy was trained using Isaac Lab 1.2, and the autogenerated h1_env.yaml may refer to legacy components, but the policy weights are compatible with current release. This package requires Pytorch 2.3.0 and higher, please refer to the Pytorch website for installation instructions for your computer configuration.
